payment_policy.description: With our interest to deliver the best shopping online experience. Skybooks accepts 2 types of payment that offer more flexibility and convenience during the purchase process.

part_1.1: With COD, our customer only pays when the products are delivered and pay the exact amount that is written on the bill. If the deliver demands an additional fee outside of the bill, please contact us for help

part_2.1: With this method, after the products are successfully ordered on the website, please finalize your payment follow instructions.
part_2.2: After the payment is done and Skybooks receives the money, we will deliver products according to the time specified in Delivery Policy.

part_3.1: If you have any further questions, please contact:

delivery_policy.description: Products can be delivered all over the world.

part_1.1: The domestic delivery time would take approximately 3-4 days.
part_1.2: For worldwide delivery, it might take up to 1-2 weeks for the item to arrive.

part_2.1: The order would be cancelled if our staffs failed to contact the customer 3 times.
part_2.2: Customers can cancel the order without being charged, if the order has not been shipped yet.
part_2.3: If the order is on the way being delivered and you still wish to cancel it, then only delivery fee will be charged.

part_3.1: For any delivery outside territory of Vietnam, please contact us.

part_1.2: With our interest to deliver the best shopping online experience.
part_1.3: Skybooks would like to announce our exchange/return policy as below:

part_2.1: Skybooks accepts exchanges and returns for the following cases:
part_2.2: - The product is damaged during the delivery process.
part_2.3: Example: the product is dented, torn, damaged, the product no longer has the same shape as the original during the delivery process to your place.
part_2.4: - The product you receive is not the same as the description on the website or from a salesman.
part_2.5: Example: wrong code, color, or size, etc.
part_2.6: - If your product is not on the list above, we have the right to reject your exchange/ refund request.

part_3.1: The time depends on customers who send defective goods to Kakapo's address and the delivery time from the shipping company.
part_3.2: We guarantee to exchange or return products as soon as possible.

part_4.2: - Different product code but with the same price: free exchange
part_4.3: - If the product you want that has a higher value than the one you currently have (based on the bill): You will pay an additional amount to get the new product according to the following formula:
part_4.4: Additional amount = (new product’s value) – (old product’s value)
part_4.5: - If the product you want that has a lower value than the one you currently have (based on the bill): You will receive an amount of money according to the following formula:
part_4.6: The amount you receive = (Old product’s value) – (new product’s value)

part_5.1: If you have any further questions, please contact:

about_us.1: After nearly two decades of development, our Skybooks Stores are now a chain of stores, covering the capital city of Hanoi, the ancient coastal village of Hoi An in the central of Vietnam, and Ho Chi Minh City, where you can find books on Vietnam in foreign languages and souvenirs from Vietnam.
about_us.2: Apart from being a large distributor of foreign languages books on Vietnam, Skybooks is also the official distributor of the world famous publishers i.e. Cambridge, Cengage, Elsevier, John Wiley, Pearson, McGraw-Hill, Macmillan, Springer, Hachette, Penguin, Random House, Simon& Schuster, Wordsworth, Phaidon, Taschen, Page One, APD, Berkeley…
about_us.3: The individual clients are always our important sector, however, Skybooks is proud to be the long term supplier for the Universities, Research Institutes, the famous international resorts/hotels and tourist sites in Vietnam and other local retail distributors with text books, reference books, books on international architecture, graphic design, fine art and literature, books introducing the land and peoples of Vietnam, and also souvenirs from Vietnam.
about_us.4: The Skybooks Stores are highlighted in many travel guide books as well as tourism web sites as ‘the spots that can not be omitted while you are in Vietnam’. The Skybooks Stores have become the frequently visited sides of many resident as well as visiting foreigners.
about_us.5: Visiting Skybooks Stores also means you are visiting a cozy ambient of Vietnam culture where your quest for exploration Vietnam is satisfied.
